tool.name: Scpred predict
tool.description: Make cell type predictions using trained model.
tool.command:
scpred_predict.R --input-object "${input_object}" --pred-data "${pred_data}" --normalise-data "${normalise_data}" --recompute-alignment "${recompute_alignment}" --reference-scaling "${reference_scaling}" --output-path "${output_tbl_path}"
#if $normalisation_method --normalisation-method "${normalisation_method}" #end if #if $scale_factor --scale-factor "${scale_factor}" #end if #if $threshold_level --threshold-level "${threshold_level}" #end if #if $max_iter_harmony --max-iter-harmony "${max_iter_harmony}" #end if #if $plot_path --plot-path "${plot_path}" #end if

param.name: pred_data
param.label: Query Data Matrix
param.help: Path to the input prediction matrix in .rds format

param.name: normalise_data
param.label: Normalise Data
param.help: Should the predicted expression data be normalised? Default: False

param.name: normalisation_method
param.label: Normalisation Method
param.help: What normalisation method should be applied to predicted data? Default: LogNormalize

param.name: scale_factor
param.label: Scale Factor
param.help: What scale factor should be applied? Note: for CPM normalisation, 1e6 is selected by default

param.name: max_iter_harmony
param.label: Max Iterations
param.help: Maximum number of rounds to run Harmony. One round of Harmony involves one clustering and one correction step

param.name: recompute_alignment
param.label: Recompute Alignment
param.help: Recompute alignment? Useful if scPredict() has already been run. Default: True

param.name: reference_scaling
param.label: Reference Scaling
param.help: Scale new dataset based on means and stdevs from reference dataset before alignment. Default: True
